summary: FOXITE Phase 4B Testing Complete - All features working correctly. Dark theme implemented on Landing, Features, and Pricing pages (bg-gray-950 with rgb(3,7,18) background). Notification bell visible in dashboard header with dropdown, unread count badge, and mark-as-read functionality all working.
critical_code_review_comments: Minor ESLint warnings in App.js for missing useEffect dependencies (lines 62, 706, 1336, 1535, 1637) - not blocking but should be addressed
seed_data_creation: Created test notification with TEST_ prefix for unread badge testing, cleaned up after tests
context_for_next_testing_agent: Phase 4B features fully tested. Dark theme uses Tailwind classes bg-gray-950, bg-gray-900, text-white, text-gray-300. NotificationBell component at lines 676-797 in App.js. Notification dropdown shows title, message, timestamp. Unread notifications have orange background (bg-orange-50), read notifications have white background. Badge shows unread count and disappears when all read.

dark_theme.landing_page: PASS - bg-gray-950 (rgb(3,7,18)), white text, orange accents
dark_theme.features_page: PASS - bg-gray-950 (rgb(3,7,18)), feature cards with bg-gray-800/50
dark_theme.pricing_page: PASS - bg-gray-950 (rgb(3,7,18)), pricing cards with dark theme

notification_bell.bell_visible: PASS - Bell icon visible in dashboard header
notification_bell.dropdown_opens: PASS - Dropdown opens on bell click
notification_bell.shows_notifications: PASS - Shows title, message, timestamp for each notification
notification_bell.unread_badge: PASS - Orange badge shows unread count (tested with count=1)
notification_bell.mark_as_read: PASS - Clicking unread notification marks it as read, badge disappears
